data.title: Ben Chapman Stats & Scouting Report
data.meta_site_name: College Baseball, MLB Draft, Prospects - Baseball America
data.text:
Diving into Crews’ performance so far as a minor leaguer, including his Statcast data, ahead of his Nationals’ debut.

Hosts Geoff Pontes and Matt Pajak dive into how a hypothetical agreement between MiLB and an unaffiliated independent league team would work.

Recent years have seen fewer and fewer high school players appearing in Arizona and Florida Complex League lineups after being drafted.

Here are the top 10 takeaways from Baseball America’s correspondent organization reports in August.

Drake Baldwin doesn’t get nearly as much hype as he deserves, plus how close is Rhett Lowder to making some noise in the majors?

Podcast hosts Carlos Collazo and Peter Flaherty discuss notable early pro debuts from the 2024 MLB draft class, summer 2025 standouts & more.

Chandler Simpson and Craig Yoho have the Hot Sheet Show’s attention, plus a deep dive on the state of high school recruiting.

Geoff Pontes welcomes an experienced dynasty baseball manager onto the podcast to discuss potential buys and sells heading into next season.

In this week’s 90th Percentile Podcast, Geoff Pontes & Matt Pajak look into how athleticism and top speed are evaluated in MLB prospects.

With the trade deadline now passed, J.J. Cooper and Geoff Pontes lead a deep-dive discussion on the state of each NL West organization.
